## rxSupportsNpm() function

Tests if we have an `npm` installation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rxSupportsNpm(): Observable<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Observable<boolean>`

true if we have an installation, else false
